DOC.brief_title: Pre-Mix Insulin Lispro Treatment Type 2 Diabetes Patients Who Consume Light Breakfast
DOC.criteria: Diabetes Mellitus , Type 2 receive metformin plus least one oral antihyperglycemic medication ( OAM ) ( sulfonylurea Thiazolidinedione [ TZD ] ) without insulin , least 90 day prior Visit 1 glycosylated hemoglobin ( HbA1c ) great equal 7.0 % le 11.0 % regularly consume light breakfast ( le 15 % total daily calorie intake ) capable willing follow protocol give write consent take TZD whose country label allow combination insulin take glucoselowering agent ( specify inclusion criterion ) body mass index great 40 kg/m^2 history severe hypoglycemia past 24 week pregnant may become pregnant woman breastfeed significant cardiac disease significant renal liver disease undergo therapy malignancy contraindication study medication irregular sleep/wake cycle
